paragraphs.text:
%pyspark

from pyspark.sql.types import *

bank_header = bankText.first()
bank = bankText.filter(lambda line : line != bank_header) \
                         .map(lambda line: line.split(';')) \
                         .map(lambda line : [int(line[0]), line[1].replace('"', ''), line[2].replace('"', ''), line[3].replace('"', ''), int(line[5]), line[6].replace('"', ''), line[7].replace('"', '')] )
                         

# create schema
schemaString = "age:int job:str marital:str education:str balance:int housing:str loan:str"
fields = [StructField(
            field.split(':')[0], \
            StringType() if field.split(':')[1]=="str" else IntegerType(), \
            True
          ) \
          for field in schemaString.split(' ')]
schema = StructType(fields)

bank_df = spark.createDataFrame(bank, schema).cache()
bank_df.createOrReplaceTempView("bank")

paragraphs.text:
%sql
/* Query 1 */
select age, count(*) value from bank
where age < 30
group by age
order by age

%sql
/* Query 1 - Input Box */

select age, count(*) value from bank
where age < ${maxAge=30} group by age
order by age

%sql
/* Query 2 - Selection Box */
select age, count(1) value
from bank
where marital="${marital=divorced,single|divorced|married}" group by age
order by age

/* Query 2 - Checkbox */

order by age

paragraphs.text:
%pyspark

###################
INPUTPATH = "file:///home/jhko/dev/4_Zeppelin/input"
###################

customersText = sc.textFile("{}/Customers.csv".format(INPUTPATH))
categoriesText = sc.textFile("{}/Categories.csv".format(INPUTPATH))
ordersText = sc.textFile("{}/Orders.csv".format(INPUTPATH))
productsText = sc.textFile("{}/Products.csv".format(INPUTPATH))
suppliersText = sc.textFile("{}/Suppliers.csv".format(INPUTPATH))

%pyspark

# Additional Tables
import re

#customers
customers_header = customersText.first()
customers = customersText.filter(lambda line : line != customers_header) \
                         .map(lambda line: re.split(',(?=[^, ]+)', line) ) \
                         .map(lambda line: line) \
                         .map(lambda line : [int(line[0]), line[1], line[4], line[6]] )
                         
customers_schemaString = "CustomerID:int CustomerName:str City:str Country:str"
customers_fields = [StructField(
            field.split(':')[0], \
            StringType() if field.split(':')[1]=="str" else IntegerType(), \
            True
          ) \
          for field in customers_schemaString.split(' ')]
customers_schema = StructType(customers_fields)

#categories
categories_header = categoriesText.first()
categories = categoriesText.filter(lambda line : line != categories_header) \
                            .map(lambda line: re.split(',(?=[^, ]+)', line) ) \
                            .map(lambda line : [int(line[0]), line[1], line[2]])
categories_schemaString = "CategoryID:int CategoryName:str Description:str"
categories_fields = [StructField(
            field.split(':')[0], \
            StringType() if field.split(':')[1]=="str" else IntegerType(), \
            True
          ) \
          for field in categories_schemaString.split(' ')]
categories_schema = StructType(categories_fields)

#orders                            
orders_header = ordersText.first()
orders = ordersText.filter(lambda line : line != orders_header) \
                         .map(lambda line: re.split(',(?=[^, ]+)', line) ) \
                         .map(lambda line : [int(line[0]), int(line[1]), int(line[2])] )
orders_schemaString = "OrderID:int CustomerID:int EmployeeID:int"
orders_fields = [StructField(
            field.split(':')[0], \
            StringType() if field.split(':')[1]=="str" else IntegerType() , \
            True
          ) \
          for field in orders_schemaString.split(' ')]
orders_schema = StructType(orders_fields)

# products
products_header = productsText.first()
products = productsText.filter(lambda line : line != products_header) \
                         .map(lambda line: re.split(',(?=[^, ]+)', line) ) \
                         .map(lambda line : [int(line[0]), line[1], int(line[2]), int(line[3]), float(line[5])] )
products_schemaString = "ProductID:int ProductName:str SupplierID:int CategoryID:int Price:float"
products_fields = [StructField(
            field.split(':')[0], \
           StringType() if field.split(':')[1]=="str" else (IntegerType() if field.split(':')[1]=="int" else FloatType()), \
            True
          ) \
          for field in products_schemaString.split(' ')]
products_schema = StructType(products_fields)

# suppliers
suppliers_header = suppliersText.first()
suppliers = suppliersText.filter(lambda line : line != suppliers_header) \
                         .map(lambda line: re.split(',(?=[^, ]+)', line) ) \
                         .map(lambda line : [int(line[0]), line[1], line[6]] )
suppliers_schemaString = "SupplierID:int SupplierName:str Country:str"
suppliers_fields = [StructField(
            field.split(':')[0], \
            StringType() if field.split(':')[1]=="str" else IntegerType(), \
            True
          ) \
          for field in suppliers_schemaString.split(' ')]
suppliers_schema = StructType(suppliers_fields)

%pyspark
customers_df = spark.createDataFrame(customers, customers_schema).cache()
customers_df.createOrReplaceTempView("Customers")

categories_df = spark.createDataFrame(categories, categories_schema).cache()
categories_df.createOrReplaceTempView("Categories")

orders_df = spark.createDataFrame(orders, orders_schema).cache()
orders_df.createOrReplaceTempView("Orders")

products_df = spark.createDataFrame(products, products_schema).cache()
products_df.createOrReplaceTempView("Products")

suppliers_df = spark.createDataFrame(suppliers, suppliers_schema).cache()
suppliers_df.createOrReplaceTempView("Suppliers")

%sql
/* Query 4 */
select distinct Customers.CustomerName, Customers.City
from Orders, Customers
where Orders.CustomerID = Customers.CustomerID

paragraphs.text:
%sql
/* Query 5 */
select Categories.CategoryID, Categories.CategoryName, count(*)
from Products, Categories
where Products.CategoryID = Categories.CategoryID
group by Categories.CategoryID, Categories.CategoryName
order by Categories.CategoryID

table.tableOptionSpecHash: [{"name":"useFilter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable filter for columns"},{"name":"showPagination","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable pagination for better navigation"},{"name":"showAggregationFooter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable a footer for displaying aggregated values"}]

paragraphs.text:
%sql
/* Query 6 */
select Suppliers.SupplierID, SupplierName, avg(Products.Price)
from Suppliers, Products
where Suppliers.SupplierID = Products.SupplierID and Products.Price > 30
group by Suppliers.SupplierID, Suppliers.SupplierName
order by Suppliers.SupplierID

table.tableOptionSpecHash: [{"name":"useFilter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable filter for columns"},{"name":"showPagination","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable pagination for better navigation"},{"name":"showAggregationFooter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable a footer for displaying aggregated values"}]

paragraphs.text:
%sql
/* Query 7 */
select Customers.Country from Customers
union
select Suppliers.Country from Suppliers
order by Country

table.tableOptionSpecHash: [{"name":"useFilter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable filter for columns"},{"name":"showPagination","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable pagination for better navigation"},{"name":"showAggregationFooter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable a footer for displaying aggregated values"}]

paragraphs.text:
%sql
/* Query 8 */
select Country, count(*)
from (select Country from Suppliers
    union all
    select Country from Customers)
group by Country
order by count(*) desc
